name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **Python** and cloud platforms such as **AWS** to design and implement robust backend systems in support of scalable, reliable applications. My proficiency in distributed systems architecture includes expertise in **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **NATS** for efficient messaging, alongside experience with **gRPC** for high-performance communication. 
I bring a strong foundation in system design and a proven record of integrating applications using tools like **Workato**. My skills extend to problem-solving and fostering effective collaboration through clear communication. Additionally, I have hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines and supporting AI/ML capabilities across various sectors, which aligns well with the demands of modern backend systems.
